Articles.Content: You don’t have to run faster than the bear to get away. You just have to run faster than the guy next to you. - Jim Butcher.
"I like bears." -Myself
"I'm smarter than the average bear, hey BooBoo!" Yogi Bear.

"Some days you go bear hunting and you get eaten. Some days you come home with a nice rug to roll around on, and bear steaks. What they don't tell you as a kid is that sometimes you get the rug and steaks, but you also get some nice scars to go with them. As a child you don't understand that you can win, but that's it's not always worth the price. Once you understand and accept that possibility you become a real grown up, and the world becomes a much more serious place. Not less fun, but once you realize what can go wrong, it's a lot scarier to go hunting 'bears'."

-Laurell K. Hamilton
"Don't get me started..." - Buddy Hackett

Noted

- Myself

"I am getting it ... but am I really getting it?"

- Vince - The Mighty Boosh
"Khaaaannn!" - Admiral James T. Kirk

"Yes, dear. I've called Billy and he's gonna come over."

-Laura Petrie
Welcome to the party pal.-John Mclaine

“You gotta fight. For your right. To parrrrrty.”

― Beastie Boys
I'm comin' up, so you better get this party started - Pink.
"Rise up! Gather 'round, rock this place to the ground..." - Def Lepard

WHAT? HOW?

-me play war thunder and missing at point blank range
ARE YOU READY TO RUMMMMMMMMMMMBLE? - Fight announcer guy.

"we have a stack of repies!" -me

(we hit 64 replies)
"Ding! Ding! Ding!" - ringside bell - WrestleMania

"Speed has never killed anyone, suddenly becoming stationary, That's what gets you."

-Jeremy Clarkson
I live my life a mile at a time. - Dom

HAMMOND!!! MAY!!! WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO MY CAR?

-Jeremy Clarckson probably
"Sometimes you eat the bear. And sometimes the bear eats you." - Jim Croce

"I suppose it is tempting, if the only tool you have is a hammer, to treat everything as if it were a nail."

- Abraham Maslow
“Horsehockey!” - Col. Sherman T. Potter

"Sign the original forms and initial the carbon copies or if you want you can initial the originals and sign the carbon copies and then you'd have to sign this form saying you signed where you should have initialed." - Corporal Walter "Radar" O'Reilly

"Henry, you have no idea what it's like sharing a tent with a guy who thinks he's all 12 disciples."

- Captain Benjamin Franklin "Hawkeye" Pierce
